name: JUMPY MAN (squid boy)
description:
CONTROLS:

A/JUMP = Z KEY

B/RUN = X KEY

START = ENTER KEY

SELECT= SPACEBAR

UP = UP KEY

DOWN = DOWN KEY

LEFT = LEFT KEY

RIGHT = RIGHT KEY

A game I made for my schools connect C.A.T (common assessment task), I used a program called GB studio for this project and only a couple of YouTube tutorials that I will link below. I know there's not a lot of documentation but I didn't really know what was worthy to be documented, so I just have a screenshot of the project editor at the end of making of the game, anyway I hope you enjoy. I used this YouTube tutorial series by Pixel Pete for the entirety of the project.
